TopicTitle: How to I transfer the Kethane from one tank to the other?

Articles.Content:
Sorry guys for the silly question but i've how do I get the fuel out of one tank and into the other?

I have them connected but can't do anymore, am I missing something?

EDIT: The kethane is in the mining vehicle on the left, I want to transfer it to the refinery on the right, I know there's no fuel/rcs tanks on the refinery they're to be attached later using the docking ports on the refinery

Edited December 15, 2013 by Biker Joe
Right click one tank, hold alt and right click the other, click in and out accordingly.
TechnicalK3rbal is correct but I'm not entirely sure if that works with the mod you are using. Try alt clicking on the pipe connections if the above solution does not work.
It works, I've done it myself Jebs done it himself.

You should be able to transfer Kethane by alt-clicking on both tanks. I think those KAS pipes have some options for how they connect though, you might want to check. The kethane converter is iffy though. I'm not sure if you'll be able to get fuel to flow from the converter to fuel tanks attached through those radial docking ports. Your best bet is to always stick a fuel tank directly onto the kethane converter.

Right click one tank, hold alt and right click the other, click in and out accordingly.

Worked, thank you!
